title: Rocket.Chat Rocketlet
description: A Rocketlet declaration for usage inside of Rocket.Chat.

id.description: The Rocketlet's unique identifier, obtained from Rocket.Chat, the company, or one in the range of private Rocketlets.

name.description: The public visible name of this Rocketlet.

version.description: The version of this Rocketlet which will be used for display publicly and letting users know there is an update. This uses the semver format.

description.description: A description of this Rocketlet, used to explain what this Rocketlet does and provides for the user.

requiredApiVersion.description: The required version of the Rocketlet's API which this Rocketlet depends on. This uses the semver format.
